017package de.learnlib.cache;
018
019import net.automatalib.automata.fsa.DFA;
020import net.automatalib.automata.transout.MealyMachine;
021import net.automatalib.words.Word;
022import de.learnlib.api.EquivalenceOracle;
023
024/**
025 * Interface for a cache used in automata learning.
026 * <p>
027 * The idea of a cache is to save (potentially expensive) queries to the real system under learning by storing the results of
028 * previous queries. This is particularly useful as many learning algorithms pose redundant queries, i.e., pose the same query
029 * twice or more times in different contexts.
030 * <p>
031 * A learning cache provides a {@link #createCacheConsistencyTest() cache consistency test}, which is an equivalence query
032 * realization that only checks a given hypothesis against the contents of the cache.
033 *    
034 * @author Malte Isberner
035 *
036 * @param <A>
037 *              the (maximally generic) automaton model for which the caches stores information. For example,
038 *              for a {@link MealyMachine Mealy} cache this would be {@code MealyMachine<?,I,?,O>. This type
039 *              determines what the cache contents can be checked against by
040 *              a {@link #createCacheConsistencyTest() cache consistency test} 
041 * @param <I>
042 *              input symbol type 
043 * @param <O>
044 *              output symbol type
045 */
046public interface LearningCache<A,I,O> {
047        
048        /**
049         * Specialization of the {@link LearningCache} interface for DFA learning.
050         * 
051         * @author Malte Isberner
052         *
053         * @param <I> input symbol type
054         */
055        public static interface DFALearningCache<I> extends LearningCache<DFA<?,I>,I,Boolean> {}
056        
057        /**
058         * Specialization of the {@link LearningCache} interface for Mealy machine learning.
059         * @author Malte Isberner
060         *
061         * @param <I> input symbol type
062         * @param <O> output symbol type
063         */
064        public static interface MealyLearningCache<I,O> extends LearningCache<MealyMachine<?,I,?,O>,I,Word<O>> {}
065        
066        /**
067         * Creates a <i>cache consistency test</i>. A cache consistency test is an equivalence oracle which checks
068         * a given hypothesis against the current contents of the cache. Hence, no queries are posed to the underlying
069         * system.
070         * <p>
071         * The created cache consistency test is backed by the cache contents. This method does not need to be invoked
072         * repeatedly when the cache contents change.
073         *  
074         * @return a cache consistency test for the contents of this cache 
075         */
076        public EquivalenceOracle<A, I, O> createCacheConsistencyTest();
077}
